org.fujion.model

Class ModelAndView<T extends BaseComponent,M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.model.ModelAndView<T,M>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The component type to be rendered.
    M - The model type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IListModel.IListModelListener, IModelAndView<T,M>, IPaginator.IPagingListener

    public class ModelAndView<T extends BaseComponent,M>
extends Object
implements IListModel.IListModelListener, IPaginator.IPagingListener, IModelAndView<T,M>
    Associates a model with a view renderer.

      • getRenderer

        public IComponentRenderer<T,M> getRenderer()
        Description copied from interface: IModelAndView
        Returns the renderer, or null if none set.
        Specified by:
        getRenderer in interface IModelAndView<T extends BaseComponent,M>
        Returns:
        The renderer, possibly null.

      • setRenderer

        public void setRenderer(IComponentRenderer<T,M> renderer)
        Description copied from interface: IModelAndView
        Sets the renderer. If not null and a model has been set, the model will be re-rendered immediately. If null, any previous rendering will be removed.
        Specified by:
        setRenderer in interface IModelAndView<T extends BaseComponent,M>
        Parameters:
        renderer - The renderer, or null to remove an existing one.

      • getModel

        public IListModel<M> getModel()
        Description copied from interface: IModelAndView
        Returns the list model, or null if none set.
        Specified by:
        getModel in interface IModelAndView<T extends BaseComponent,M>
        Returns:
        The list model, possibly null.

      • setModel

        public void setModel(IListModel<M> model)
        Description copied from interface: IModelAndView
        Sets the list model. If not null and a renderer has been set, the model will be re-rendered immediately. If null, any previous rendering will be removed.
        Specified by:
        setModel in interface IModelAndView<T extends BaseComponent,M>
        Parameters:
        model - The list model, or null to remove an existing one.

      • rerender

        public void rerender()
        Description copied from interface: IModelAndView
        Force a re-rendering of the model. If either a model or a renderer has not been set, this will have no effect.
        Specified by:
        rerender in interface IModelAndView<T extends BaseComponent,M>

      • onRenderStart

        protected void onRenderStart()
        If deferred rendering is active, sets the synchronizer to queueing mode.

      • onRenderStop

        protected void onRenderStop()
        If deferred rendering is active, sets the synchronizer to non-queueing mode and flushes its queue.

      • renderChild

        protected T renderChild(int modelIndex)
        Renders a child.
        Parameters:
        modelIndex - The index of the model object to be rendered.
        Returns:
        The rendered child component, or null if no renderer has been registered or pagination is active and the child falls outside the current page.

      • destroyChild

        protected void destroyChild(int modelIndex)
        Destroys the child component corresponding to the model object at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        modelIndex - The index of the model object.

      • destroy

        public void destroy()
        Clean up all resources.

        Description copied from interface: IModelAndView
        Re-render a specific model object given its index.

      • getDeferredRendering

        public boolean getDeferredRendering()
        Description copied from interface: IModelAndView
        Returns deferred rendering setting. If true, rendering to the client is deferred until all model objects are rendered, then client updates are sent in bulk. This can be more efficient when rendering a large number of items.
        Specified by:
        getDeferredRendering in interface IModelAndView<T extends BaseComponent,M>
        Returns:
        The deferred rendering setting.

      • setDeferredRendering

        public void setDeferredRendering(boolean value)
        Description copied from interface: IModelAndView
        Sets the deferred rendering setting. If true, rendering to the client is deferred until all model objects are rendered, then client updates are sent in bulk. This can be more efficient when rendering a large number of items.
        Specified by:
        setDeferredRendering in interface IModelAndView<T extends BaseComponent,M>
        Parameters:
        value - The deferred rendering setting.

      • getPaginator

        public IPaginator getPaginator()
        Description copied from interface: IModelAndView
        Returns the paging controller, if any.
        Specified by:
        getPaginator in interface IModelAndView<T extends BaseComponent,M>
        Returns:
        The paging controller, possibly null.
